==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|ひ|ふく|けい|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
Literally "embedded form". Compound of {{m|ja|被覆|tr=hifuku}} and {{m|ja|形|tr=-kei}}.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ひふくけい}}

# in Japanese morphology, a type of apophony caused typically found in compounds
